main_definition: A person who is new to a particular activity or organization, often lacking experience.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A beginner or novice in any field.
meanings_and_examples.example: As a newbie in photography, she still struggled with the basics of composition.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Someone who is freshly recruited or recently joined an organization or group.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company welcomed its first set of newbies to the sales department this month.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An inexperienced person, especially one just starting out with a hobby or sport.
meanings_and_examples.example: In the world of coding, every newbie starts by learning HTML and CSS before moving on to more advanced languages like JavaScript.
